detaileddescription.para: The maximum number of possible R-factors
The accuracy in comparing energies using floating point.
The accuracy in comparing indices using floating point.
Any intensities smaller than this value are considered to be zerointensities smaller than this value are considered to be zero

group ID for average over all curves
Ignore Features larger than 100eV (defines the lower limit in Fourier space when calculating Rg-Factor)
